resources.string: "Bluetooth devices will show up here as they are detected during the scanning process\n\nYou can start a scan process either by swiping the screen from the top or tapping the Scan-button here below."
"The app can't scan for devices if the requested permissions aren't granted"
"The app can't scan for devices unless Bluetooth is enabled"

"The app needs Location permissions in order to function as designed. This permission allows the app to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices.\n\nNext, you will have the opportunity to review and grant or decline the Location permission."
